Translations.Text: elif-lam-mim
ehasibe-nnasu ey yutraku ey yekulu amenna vehum la yuftenun
velekad fetenne-llezine min kablihim feleya`lemenne-llahu-llezine sadeku veleya`lemenne-lkazibin
em hasibe-llezine ya`melune-sseyyiati ey yesbikuna. sae ma yahkumun
men kane yercu likae-llahi feinne ecele-llahi leatin. vehuve-ssemi`u-l`alim
vemen cahede feinnema yucahidu linefsih. inne-llahe leganiyyun `ani-l`alemin
vellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati lenukeffiranne `anhum seyyiatihim velenecziyennehum ahsene-llezi kanu ya`melun
vevessayne-l'insane bivalideyhi husna. vein cahedake litusrike bi ma leyse leke bihi `ilmun fela tuti`huma. ileyye merci`ukum feunebbiukum bima kuntum ta`melun
vellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati lenudhilennehum fi-ssalihin

vemine-nnasi mey yekulu amenna billahi feiza uziye fi-llahi ce`ale fitnete-nnasi ke`azabi-llah. velein cae nasrum mir rabbike leyekulunne inna kunna me`akum. eveleyse-llahu bia`leme bima fi suduri-l`alemin
veleya`lemenne-llahu-llezine amenu veleya`lemenne-lmunafikin
vekale-llezine keferu lillezine amenu-ttebi`u sebilena velnahmil hatayakum. vema hum bihamiline min hatayahum min sey'. innehum lekazibun
veleyahmilunne eskalehum eskalem me`a eskalekum. veleyus'elunne yevme-lkiyameti `amma kanu yefterun
velekad erselna nuhan ila kavmihi felebise fihim elfe senetin illa hamsine `ama. feehazehumu-ttufanu vehum zalimun
feenceynahu veashabe-ssefineti vece`alnaha ayetel lil`alemin
veibrahime iz kale likavmihi-`budu-llahe vettekuh. zalikum hayrul lekum in kuntum ta`lemun
innema ta`budune min duni-llahi evsanev vetahlukune ifka. inne-llezine ta`budune min duni-llahi la yemlikune lekum rizkan febtegu `inde-llahi-rrizka va`buduhu veskuru leh. ileyhi turce`un
vein tukezzibu fekad kezzebe umemum min kablikum. vema `ale-rrasuli ille-lbelagu-lmubin
evelem yerav keyfe yubdiu-llahu-lhalka summe yu`iduh. inne zalike `ale-llahi yesir
kul siru fi-l'ardi fenzuru keyfe bedee-lhalka summe-llahu yunsiu-nnes'ete-l'ahirah. inne-llahe `ala kulli sey'in kadir
yu`azzibu mey yesau veyerhamu mey yesa'. veileyhi tuklebun
vema entum bimu`cizine fi-l'ardi vela fi-ssema'. vema lekum min duni-llahi miv veliyyiv vela nesir
vellezine keferu biayati-llahi velikaihi ulaike yeisu mir rahmeti veulaike lehum `azabun elim
fema kane cevabe kavmihi illa en kalu-ktuluhu ev harrikuhu feencahu-llahu mine-nnar. inne fi zalike leayatil likavmiy yu'minun
vekale inneme-ttehaztum min duni-llahi evsanem meveddete beynikum fi-lhayati-ddunya. summe yevme-lkiyameti yekfuru ba`dukum biba`div veyel`anu ba`dukum ba`da. veme'vakum-nnaru vema lekum min nasirin
feamene lehu lut. vekale inni muhacirun ila rabbi. innehu huve-l`azizu-lhakim
vevehebna lehu ishaka veya`kube vece`alna fi zurriyyetehu-nnubuvvete velkitabe veateynahu ecrahu fi-ddunya. veinnehu fi-l'ahirati lemine-ssalihin
velutan iz kale likavmihi innekum lete'tune-lfahiseh. ma sebekakum biha min ehadim mine-l`alemin
einnekum lete'tune-rricale vetakta`une-ssebile vete'tune fi nadikumu-lmunker. fema kane cevabe kavmihi illa en kalu-'tina bi`azabi-llahi in kunte mine-ssadikin
kale rabbi-nsurni `ale-lkavmi-lmufsidin
velemma caet rusuluna ibrahime bilbusra kalu inna muhliku ehli hazihi-lkaryeh. inne ehleha kanu zalimin
kale inne fiha luta. kalu nahnu a`lemu bimen fiha. lenunecciyennehu veehlehu ille-mraeteh. kanet mine-lgabirin
velemma en caet rusuluna lutan sie bihim vedaka bihim zer`av vekalu la tehaf vela tahzen. inna muneccuke veehleke ille-mraeteke kanet mine-lgabirin
inna munzilune `ala ehli hazihi-lkaryeti riczem mine-ssemai bima kanu yefsukun
velekat terakna minha ayetem beyyinetel likavmiy ya`kilun
veila medyene ehahum su`ayben fekale ya kavmi-`budu-llahe veercu-lyevme-l'ahira vela ta`sev fi-l'ardi mufsidin
fekezzebuhu feehazethumu-rracfetu feasbehu fi darihim casimin
ve`adev vesemude vekat tebeyyene lekum mim mesakinihim. vezeyyene lehumu-sseytanu a`malehum fesaddehum `ani-ssebili vekanu mustebsirin
vekarune vefir`avne vehamane velekad caehum musa bilbeyyinati festekberu fi-l'ardi vema kanu sabikin

fekullen ehazna bizembih. feminhum men erselna `aleyhi hasiba. veminhum men ehazethu-ssayhah. veminhum men hasefna bihi-l'ard. veminhum men agrakna. vema kane-llahu liyazlimehum velakin kanu enfusehum yazlimun
meselu-llezine-ttehazu min duni-llahi evliyae kemeseli-l`nkebut. ittehazet beyta. veinne evhene-lbuyuti lebeytu-l`nkebut. lev kanu ya`lemun
inne-llahe ya`lemu ma yed`une min dunihi min sey'. vehuve-l`azizu-lhakim
vetilke-l'emsalu nadribuha linnas. vema ya`kiluha ille-l`alimun
haleka-llahu-ssemavati vel'arda bilhakk. inne fi zalike leayetel lilmu'minin
utlu ma uhiye ileyke mine-lkitabi veekimi-ssalah. inne-ssalate tenha `ani-lfahsai velmunker. velezikru-llahi ekber. vellahu ya`lemu ma tasne`un
vela tucadilu ehle-lkitabi illa billeti hiye ahsen. ille-llezine zalemu minhum vekulu amenna billezi unzile ileyna veunzile ileykum veileyha veilahukum vahiduv venahnu lehu muslimun
vekezalike enzelna ileyke-lkitab. fellezine ateynahumu-lkitabe yu'minune bih. vemin haulai mey yu'minu bih. vema yechadu biayatina ille-lkafirun
vema kunte tetlu min kablihi min kitabiv vela tehuttuhu biyeminike izel lertabe-lmubtilun
bel huve ayatum beyyinatun fi suduri-llezine utu-l`ilm. vema yechadu biayatina ille-zzalimun
vekalu levla unzile `aleyhi ayatum mir rabbih. kul inneme-l'ayatu `inde-llah. veinnema ene nezirum mubin
evelem yekfihim enna enzelna `aleyke-lkitabe yutla `aleyhim. inne fi zalike lerahmetev vezikra likavmiy yu'minun
kul kefa billahi beyni vebeynekum sehida. ya`lemu ma fi-ssemavati vel'ard. vellezine amenu bilbatili vekeferu billahi ulaike humu-lhasirun
veyesta`ciluneke bil`azab. velevla ecelum musemmel lecaehum-l`azab. veleye'tiyennehum bagtetev vehum la yes`urun
yesta`ciluneke bil`azab. veinne cehenneme lemuhitatum bilkafirin
yevme yagsahumu-l`azabu min fevkihim vemin tahti erculihim veyekulu zuku ma kuntum ta`melun
ya `ibadiye-llezine amenu inne ardi vasi`aten feiyyaye fa`budun
kullu nefsin zaikatu-lmevti summe ileyna turce`un
vellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati lenubevviennehum mine-lcenneti gurafen tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu halidine fiha. ni`me ecru-l`amilin
ellezine saberu ve`ala rabbihim yetevekkelun
vekeeyyim min dabbetil la tahmilu rizkaha. allahu yerzukuha veiyyakum. vehuve-ssemi`u-l`alim
velein seeltehum men haleka-ssemavati vel'arda vesehhara-ssemse velkamera leyekulunne-llah. feenna yu'fekun
allahu yebsutu-rrizka limey yesau min `ibadihi veyakdiru leh. inne-llahe bikulli sey'in `alim
velein seeltehum men nezzele mine-ssemai maen feahya bihi-l'arda mim ba`di mevtiha leyekulunne-llah. kuli-lhamdu lillah. bel ekseruhum la ya`kilun
vema hazihi-lhayatu-ddunya illa lehvuv vele`ib. veinne-ddara-l'ahirate lehiye-lhayevan. lev kanu ya`lemun
feiza rakibu fi-lfulki de`avu-llahe muhlisine lehu-ddin. felemma neccahum ile-lberri iza hum yusrikun
liyekfuru bima ateynahum veliyetemette`u. fesevfe ya`lemun
evelem yerav enna ce`alna haramen aminev veyutehattafu-nnasu min havlehum. efebilbatili yu'minune vebini`meti-llahi yekfurun
vemen azlemu mimmeni-ftera `ale-llahi keziben ev kezzebe bilhakki lemma caeh. eleyse fi cehenneme mesvel lilkafirin
vellezine cahedu fina lenehdiyennehum subulena. veinne-llahe leme`a-lmuhsinin
